atrai.core

Class Transformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • atrai.core.Transformer

  • public class Transformer
extends Object
    Manages sequencing patterns, modifiers, and replacers to build a complex chain of tree transformations.
    Author:
    Koushik Sen, Alex Reinking

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Transformer(Lexer lexer)
      Create a new transformer for languages tokenized by lexer
      Transformer(Lexer patternLexer, Lexer templateLexer)
      Create a new visitor for trees built from the lexer

      • addTransformer

        public Transformer addTransformer(String pattern,
                                  Function<Object[],Object> directModifier)
        Apply the directModifier to trees matching the pattern
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to match
        directModifier - the direct modifier to apply. A direct modifier returns the modified tree directly without using nay replacement expression.
        Returns:
        returns this

        public Object transform(Object treeNode,
                        Object context)
